markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Practiced Paddler](/Feats.aspx?ID=1221) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Shoony" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=296" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 73</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Paddler Shoony](/Heritages.aspx?ID=56) heritage

</column>

---

You’re skilled at navigating bogs and marshes, even for a paddler shoony. You gain a swim Speed of 15 feet.
name: Practiced Paddler
